attributes.action: childcare funding for all Two and three year olds
attributes.additional_details: Provide at least 15 hrs childcare funding for all two and three year olds so parents and carers are able to work without struggling to pay for childcare people who are unemployed get free childcare but parents that work get nothing and have to wait until the child’s three to get 15 hours I’m writing this partition to get the government to fund all children age two and three at least 15 hours of childcare
attributes.background: Provide childcare funding  for all two and three year olds not just for people who are unemployed so parents can work instead of struggling to find and pay for childcare so two years olds and three year olds can attend nursery or a childminder

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petitions which are currently open on this topic:

Fund free childcare from 1 year old
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593048

Provide free childcare to working parents for children over 9 months.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580622

Offer 15hrs free childcare for multiples under 3 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580137
